ThingDef.label: Augmetic Hand (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Hand. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Arm (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Arm. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Foot (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Foot. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Leg (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Leg. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Adamantium Spine (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Adamantium Spine. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Kidney (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Kidney. (Increases Blood Filtration, and makes immune to Malaria, Sleeping Sickness and Plague). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Stomach (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Stomach. (Increase Eating Stat, and makes immune to Gutworms). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Eye (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Eye. (Increase Sight Slightly). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Augmetic Ear (T1)
ThingDef.description: Imperial Augmetic Ear. (Increase Hearing Slightly) To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Ranged Weapon Neural Augment (T2)
ThingDef.description: A Neural Augment that is attached to the Brain, that increases Accuracy and Aim Delay factor considerably. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Drone Neural Augment (T2)
ThingDef.description: A Neural Augment that is attached to the Brain, that increases all work related skills considerably. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: SynthSkin Armor Augment (T2)
ThingDef.description: A SynthSkin Armor Augment that covers the Torso of the user and provides additional damage resistance for Blunt, Sharp, Heat and Electric. To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Respiratory Augmetic (T2)
ThingDef.description: The Respiratory Augmetic, provides a boost to the respiratory system. (Increase to Breathing and moving). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Vocal Augmetic (T2)
ThingDef.description: The Respiratory Augmetic, provides a boost to Talking. (Increase to Talking and Diplomacy Skills). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Pain Electoo (T2)
ThingDef.description: Pain Electoo that dulls Pain as required. (Decreases Pain Susceptibility). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Mood Stabiliser Electoo (T2)
ThingDef.description: Mood Stabiliser Electoo makes you happy. (Applies a +10 Mood Effect to Pawn, but decreases Consciousness Slightly). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Occulobe (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Occulobe, also called the Eye of Vengeance, is the 10th of the 19 genetically-engineered gene-seed organs that are implanted into a Space Marine Neophyte to produce a new Astartes. (Increase Sight, Accuracy and Melee Hit Chance). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Lyman's Ear (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Lyman's Ear, also called the Sentinel, is the 11th of the 19 genetically-engineered gene-seed organs that are implanted into a Space Marine Neophyte to produce a new Astartes. Not only does this implant's improved inner ear structure make a Space Marine immune to dizziness or motion sickness but it also allows Space Marines to consciously filter out and greatly enhance certain sounds over the capabilities of normal human hearing.(Increases hearing, better melee dodge chance, and prisoner recruit chance). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Black Carapace (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Black Carapace, also known as the Interface, provide an efficient interface for the use of the Astarte Armor. (This will offset all the negative aspects of the Space Marine Power Armor!). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Ossmodula (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Ossmodula, also called the Ironheart, is the 2nd of the 19 gene-seed organs implanted into a Space Marine Neophyte during the induction process to create a new Astartes, it acts to synthesise the rapid growth of an Astartes' skeleto-muscular system which results in an Astartes' superhuman strength and massive size compared to a baseline human male! (Increases Speed and Manipulation). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Secondary Heart (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Secondary Heart, also called the Maintainer, is the first and least difficult of the 19 Astarte gene-seed organ implants a Space Marine Neophyte receives to transform him into a full Astartes. It resembles a smaller version of the human heart and is implanted in the chest cavity and connected to the rest of the Neophyte's circulatory and pulmonary systems near the original heart. (Increases Blood Puming and Filtration to better fend off disease). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Omophagea (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Omophagea, also called the Remembrancer, is the 8th of the 19 genetically-engineered gene-seed organs that are implanted into a Space Marine Neophyte to produce a new superhuman Astartes. The Omophagea is implanted into the spinal cord and then wired into the central nervous system so that it is directly attached to the cerebral cortex and to the stomach. (It increase the Learning and research rate, and lowers Psychic Sensitivity). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Catalepsean Node (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Catalepsean Node, also called the Unsleeping, is the 6th of the 19 gene-seed organs that are implanted into a Space Marine Neophyte to produce a new Astartes. This organ is implanted into the back of the cerebrum, just above the brain stem. When deprived of sleep for a long period of time, the Catalepsean Node "cuts in" upon detecting a rise in the Astartes' stress and fatigue hormones. This allows the Astartes to consciously "switch off" sections of the brain sequentially, while remaining awake and alert. (Decreases metabolism, remain awake longer and eat less). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, and associated research.

ThingDef.label: Rite of Pure Thought (T3)
ThingDef.description: The Rite of Pure Thought was a ritual conducted by Techpriests of the Adeptus Mechanicus. This procedure was considered an extreme measure even amongst the Techpriests though it has become an accepted practice over the millennia. It involves the replacement of the right hemisphere of the brain, which contains the creative, emotional and illogical centres. This area is removed and a Cogitator is placed within it which is directly linked to the left hemisphere of the brain. The Rite gives a devotee pure thought and clarity, thus freeing them from the distraction of emotions or any sense of self-preservation. (Lots of Powerful Mental Stat Increases). To Install you need hospital bed, Refined Kalma, Imperial Med Kits, Imperial Nano Component, Brains, and associated research.
